headline: Revvity (RVTY) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of life sciences company Revvity (NYSE:RVTY) fell 2.4% in the afternoon session after it reported third-quarter financial results that showed a drop in profits and margins, even as revenue grew.

headline: Revvity (NYSE:RVTY) Posts Q3 Sales In Line With Estimates
summary: Life sciences company Revvity (NYSE:RVTY) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 2.2% year on year to $698.9 million. The company’s outlook for the full year was close to analysts’ estimates with revenue guided to $2.86 billion at the midpoint. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.18 per share was 3.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
